channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: When God finishes his masterpiece of creation, he signs his signature of holiness in the time of the Sabbath; the Bible says that the Sabbath is also God's signature of his work in everyone.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: IIW Sabbath School
channel.desc: The host, along with a panel of religious scholars, conduct various discussions to provide an in-depth insight into various topics from the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Spotless
channel.desc: Shelley Quinn delves into the dramatic life accounts of the great patriarchs of the Book of Genesis and the lessons gleaned from their respective lives.[(96057)]
